Wednesday, May 02, 2012

Nature of Code - Showreel

A very short video showing some of the experiments and projects I did this semester in the Nature of Code class at ITP.

You can download a much higher quality version of the video over on Vimeo. The code for all the experiments and projects shown in the video is available over on github.

Paul May is a researcher and designer from Dublin, living and working in New York. Find out more about Paul's work or get in touch.
